publisher.publisher-name: Chinese Academy of Mathematices and System Sciences (AMSS) Chinese Academy of Sciences

title-group.article-title: CONVERGENCE OF AN ALTERNATING A-ɸ SCHEME FOR QUASI-MAGNETOSTATIC EDDY CURRENT PROBLEM

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2004 AMSS, Chinese Academy of Sciences and VSP

abstract.p: We propose in this paper an alternating A-ɸ method for the quasi-magnetostatic eddy current problem by means of finite element approximations. Bounds for continuous and discrete error in finite time are given. And it is verified that provided the time step τ is sufficiently small, the proposed algorithm yields for finite time T an error of O(h + τ1/2) in the L²-norm for the magnetic field H(= µ⁻¹▽ × A), where h is the mesh size, µ the magnetic permeability.
